en.headline: Power-aware DevOps & sustainable software
en.tagline: PhD researcher in Bolzano exploring feedback loops for greener software and resilient real-time systems.
en.siteDescription: Notes on power-aware DevOps, greener software, and real-time systems research by Alessandro Aneggi.
summary: Bolzano-based PhD candidate at the Free University of Bozen-Bolzano designing developer-facing energy feedback loops.
Explores how CI/CD telemetry and real-time systems can stay reliable while exposing power consumption to teams.
Open to collaborations on sustainable software, DevOps automation, and energy-aware tooling.

focus.title: Power-aware DevOps
focus.description: Embed energy signals into CI/CD so developers see the impact of changes without slowing delivery.

focus.title: Real-time systems
focus.description: Reduce big-bang integration risk in fast-moving environments through tighter feedback loops.

focus.title: Sustainable software
focus.description: Blend performance, reliability, and energy measurements to guide engineering choices.

experience: Master's in Software Engineering · University of Bolzano (2020–2023)
Master's in Net Economy · University of Trento (2009–2012)
Bachelor in Engineering · University of Trento (2004–2008)

it.headline: DevOps attento ai consumi e software sostenibile
it.tagline: Dottorando a Bolzano: esploro feedback loop per software piu verde e sistemi real-time resilienti.
it.siteDescription: Note su DevOps attento all'energia, software piu sostenibile e ricerca sui sistemi real-time di Alessandro Aneggi.
summary: Dottorando a Bolzano, progetto sistemi di feedback energetico pensati per gli sviluppatori.
Studio come la telemetria CI/CD e i sistemi real-time possano restare affidabili mostrando i consumi.
Aperto a collaborazioni su software sostenibile, automazione DevOps ed energy-aware tooling.

focus.title: DevOps attento ai consumi
focus.description: Porto segnali energetici dentro la CI/CD cosi gli sviluppatori vedono l'impatto senza rallentare il delivery.

focus.title: Sistemi real-time
focus.description: Ridurre il rischio di integrazioni big-bang in ambienti veloci con feedback loop piu stretti.

focus.title: Software sostenibile
focus.description: Unire performance, affidabilita ed energia per guidare le scelte ingegneristiche.

experience: Laurea magistrale in Ingegneria del Software · Universita di Bolzano (2020–2023)
Master in Net Economy · Universita di Trento (2009–2012)
Laurea in Ingegneria · Universita di Trento (2004–2008)
